root.name: Hyakuretsuken: Hokuto no Ken Gekiuchi 3
root.description: OverviewThis was the fourth and final typing game that came out in April 2003.StoryThe story takes from different parts of the manga where Kenshiro fights different opponents starting with Mr Heart and working all the way up to Kaioh.GameplayThe game was revamped from previous typing games where now there are 10 stages in total and with the graphics changed to the original manga drawings. Apart from the main Story Mode, there were also two other modes added. One was a 5 minute mode where the player must beat the enemy within 5 minutes and the other one is a vs mode where the player can choose any of the other characters and pit them against the other characters.Playable CharactersKenshiroMr. HeartShinReiJagiShewThouzerTokiRaohFalcoKaioh
